data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 892,800 souls in Barguna and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Barguna, Barisal, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Barguna.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary: On average, 189 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Barguna, Barisal, Bangladesh.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Barguna.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 1,118 believers in the county of Barguna with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Jamadar people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, help the 1,118 believers find a person of peace today among the 891,681 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Barguna.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 1,118 believers living in the county of Barguna. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

location.name: Barguna
location.people_groups_list: Jat (Muslim traditions), Jotdar, Namassej (Muslim traditions), Kaora, Maulangi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Jat (Muslim traditions) (4,100), Jotdar (1,600), Namassej (Muslim traditions) (1,500), Kaora (5,100), Maulangi (500)
